summary: Overhauls characters from the legendary Interesting NPCs mod by Kris Takahashi for a more fantasy/anime look.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Overhauls NPCs from the legendary Interesting NPCs mod by Kris Takahashi. Not lore-friendly.
[/size][color=#0B5394][size=5]
~Currently Overhauled NPCs~[/size][/color][size=4]
* Al 'Hassan
* Amalee
* Ange The Song-Bearer
* Arilwaen[size=4]
[size=4]* Breton (unnamed quest starter in Winking Skeever)[/size]
* Callen[/size]
[size=4]* Caylene[/size]
[size=4]* Clario Moorsley[/size]

author: TheK8iKat
